DocAttribute.Name: ProjectedOrTrue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines if the load values are given by using the length of the member on which they act (true length) or by using the projected length resulting from the loaded member and the global project coordinate system. It is only considered if the global project coordinate system is used, and if the action is of type IfcStructuralLinearAction or IfcStructuralPlanarAction.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR61
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A linear action should place either a linear force or a temperature force.
